replace.with: PRIMARY KEY (`bug_id`), FULLTEXT KEY bugs_fulltext_short_desc_idx (short_desc), FULLTEXT KEY bugs_fulltext_comments_idx (comments), FULLTEXT KEY bugs_fulltext_comments_noprivate_idx (comments_noprivate))ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

changeSet.author: cmorgan
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE bugs MODIFY estimated_time DECIMAL(7,2) DEFAULT NULL
